highlights.title: Ranked 5th Nationally — TTA U17 Boys
highlights.description: Ranked 5th in Australia in the Table Tennis Australia Under 17 Boys national rankings.

highlights.title: Ranked 32nd Nationally — TTA Men
highlights.description: Ranked 32nd in Australia in the Table Tennis Australia Men's national rankings, competing against players of all ages.

highlights.title: Gold Medal — NSW Secondary Schools Boys Shield (Teams)
highlights.description: Gold medallist representing his school in the NSW Secondary School Boys Shield Teams event.

highlights.title: Menai High School Outstanding Performance in State Knockout
highlights.description: Recognised by Menai High School for outstanding performance in the State Knockout competition.

highlights.title: Gold Medal — Australian U17 Boys Teams
highlights.description: Gold medallist in the Australian Under 17 Boys Teams event at the national championships.

highlights.title: Gold Medal — TTA Tour Mandurah, U17 Boys Singles
highlights.description: Gold medallist in the Under 17 Boys Singles at the Table Tennis Australia Tour event in Mandurah.

highlights.title: Gold Medal — TTA Tour Canberra, U17 Boys Singles
highlights.description: Gold medallist in the Under 17 Boys Singles at the Table Tennis Australia Tour event in Canberra.

highlights.title: Gold Medal — NSW Junior Closed, U21 Men's Singles
highlights.description: Gold medallist in the Under 21 Men's Singles at the NSW Junior Closed Championships.

highlights.title: Silver Medal — NSW Open, U21 Men's Singles
highlights.description: Silver medallist in the Under 21 Men's Singles at the NSW Open Championships.

highlights.title: TTA Accredited Level 1 Coach
highlights.description: Achieved Table Tennis Australia Level 1 coaching accreditation, giving back to the sport he loved.

highlights.title: Menai High School Diamond Award
highlights.description: Recipient of the Menai High School Diamond Award, the school's highest honour for student achievement.

highlights.title: David Coleman MP Outstanding Sporting Achievement Award
highlights.description: Awarded the 2018–2023 David Coleman MP (Banks) Outstanding Sporting Achievement Award in recognition of his table tennis achievements.

highlights.title: Gold Medal — NSW Junior Open, U11 Boys Singles
highlights.description: Gold medallist in the Under 11 Boys Singles at the NSW Junior Open Championships.

highlights.title: Bronze Medal — NSW Junior Open, U11 Mixed Doubles
highlights.description: Bronze medallist in the Under 11 Mixed Doubles at the NSW Junior Open Championships.

highlights.title: Wendy Lindsay MP Table Tennis National Award
highlights.description: Awarded the Wendy Lindsay MP (East Hills) Table Tennis National Award.

highlights.title: Gold Medal — Australian Championships, U11 Boys Teams
highlights.description: Gold medallist in the Under 11 Boys Teams event at the Australian Championships — his first national gold medal, aged 9.

highlights.title: Bronze Medal — Australian Championships, U11 Mixed Doubles
highlights.description: Bronze medallist in the Under 11 Mixed Doubles at the Australian Championships.

highlights.title: Mark Coure MP Table Tennis National Award
highlights.description: Awarded the Mark Coure MP (Oatley) Table Tennis National Award.

videos.title: Highlights
videos.description: Match footage and highlights from Lachlan's competitive career.
